General.Name: Yesil Yapi Endustrisi AS
General.Description: Yesil Yapi Endüstrisi A.S. operates as a construction company in Turkey and internationally. The company undertakes the construction of industrial plants, villas, commercial business centers, hospitals, housing projects, educational buildings, hotels, restoration and renovation projects, shopping malls, and cultural centers. Yesil Yapi Endüstrisi A.S. was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
